page.title: 18CRAZIES HILL SCHOOL VISIT
page.content: There are many sources from which one can extract information. Curricular activities away from school can be a starting point for a study or can enhance a project already begun. day visits provide practical information and experience in specific areas, while residential visits give a more varied experience, socially & academically. To see a dredger at work is better than only to read about it. {Vernon's Visit to Canute House, Poole} I liked pottery with Russell best. I liked plunging my hands into the gooey clay. Although I made a mess of it like I am always making a mess of things it was great fun. Making models is not easy, after all. Mr Lambert helped me with my coil pot, but he made a mess of his wheel pot. My pot came out{WELL} in the end, and nobody's pot exploded.
